sections.title: Overview
sections.content: RobotContainer is the central hub of command-based programming. It creates subsystems, configures default commands, and binds controller inputs to commands.

sections.title: RobotContainer Responsibilities
sections.subtitle: This class:
items: Sets Default Commands: Define what happens when no command is running.

sections.title: Basic RobotContainer
Button Bindings
sections.content:
CommandXboxController provides trigger methods:

whileTrue(): Run command while button held
whileFalse(): Run command while button not held
whenPressed(): Run command once when pressed
whenReleased(): Run command once when released
toggleOnTrue(): Toggle command on/off

sections.title: Button Binding Examples
Default Commands
sections.content: Default commands run when no other command requires the subsystem. Common examples: stop motors, maintain a position, or follow driver input. Set with subsystem.setDefaultCommand(command).
